title: Get Reviews
name: get_reviews
description: Get highest ranked reviews for a specific place. Reviews returned from this API call are sorted based on the ranked score.

Parameter.description: id for the item you want to get reviews for
type of the item you want to get reviews for
Locale for the reviews (defaults to en_US)
0/1 whether you want https or not
Your client_id as given to you from Gogobot API team

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
   {
      status:200,
      result:{
         attribution_url:"http://www.gogobot.com/venetian-resort-hotel-casino-las-vegas-hotel",

               rating:"4.0",
               review_text:"All suites hotels are great for a group of friends traveling and having a fun time together....",

               reviewer_name:"Mel S Wong",
               reviewer_profile_photo:"https://cdn1.gbot.me/photos/I9/U5/1322768755/gogomels-20000000002211104-75x75.jpg",

Error 4xx.description: The id of the User was not found.

title: Nearby Search
name: search_nearby
description: User Gogobot search index in order to search places nearby a specific lat/lng

Parameter.description: Use this to restrict your search (can be: 'Hotel', 'Restaurant', 'Attraction')
How you want the results to be sorted (can be: best_match / distance / rating)
0/1 whether you want https or not
Your client_id as given to you from Gogobot API team

examples.title: Success-Response:

Error 4xx.description: The id of the User was not found.
